body: Tastumi x Esdeath... but only as a single page at the end. God you fucking cock teases, quit with the yuri incest rape shit and give the people what they REALLY want.

Why can't they make a Tatsumi x Esdeath comic?  Vanilla is fine.  Kidnapping as well.  But I would love to see an actual comic of this pairing...

Maybe an alternate ending to the anime?  Where Esdeath takes Tatsumi away...
WHY CAN'T JAPS DRAW ONE SINGLE ESDEATH VANILLA COMIC?!
Without the tentacles this would have been a masterpiece imo
Finally some english akame ga kill stuff
